Package com.project.CyShare.controller

Class CarController

java.lang.Object
com.project.CyShare.controller.CarController
@RestController public class CarController extends Object
This controller is used to perform certain operations regarding cars (i.e., add, delete, or find a car).
Author:
Hugo Alvarez Valdivia

  • Method Details

    • getAllCars

      @GetMapping("cars/all") public List<Car> getAllCars()
      This mapping returns all cars currently saved in the database.
      Returns:
      All cars saved.

    • getCarById

      @GetMapping(path="/cars/{id}") public Car getCarById(@PathVariable long id)
      Find a car by its id number.
      Parameters:
      id - id of the car to be found.
      Returns:
      Car object requested.

    • createCar

      @PostMapping("cars/add") public String createCar(@RequestBody Car car)
      This mapping adds a new Car entity into the database.
      Parameters:
      car - Car to be added.
      Returns:
      Success/failure message.

    • deleteCar

      @DeleteMapping("cars/delete/{id}") public String deleteCar(@PathVariable long id)
      This mapping deletes a car from the database using its id number to find it.
      Parameters:
      id - id number of the car to be deleted.
      Returns:
      Success/failure message.
